name: 1 in 500
description:
A game about a turtle made for the SEAJAM - #TeamSeas Game Jam. This is a jam for games related to ocean perservation, to help #TeamSeas in their effort to raise $30,000,000 to remove 30,000,000 pounds of plastic trash from our oceans, rivers and beaches.

https://teamseas.org/

This game has been done completely by myself, Laura Almón Manzano, in a week for the jam, with the exception of the background animals (crab, white shark, octopus, perch, pike and salmon), which are from the Unity asset "Animal pack deluxe": https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/animals/animal-pack-deluxe-9...

In this game, you control a turtle and must survive long enough to finish the game:

  • Eating seaweed so as not to starve to death.
  • Avoiding eating plastic by mistake.
